About Me

I'm a software developer who enjoys building practical and reliable tools. I work mostly with AI, automation, and backend systems.I'm focused on integrating ML models into intuitive, user-friendly interfaces.

I enjoy turning ideas into working products quickly and keeping things simple, scalable, and useful. Always experimenting, always building.

My Projects

Launch soon
InkVision
I built cross-platform mobile app and backend, enabling users to preview tattoos on their own skin. I worked on training and productionizing a custom diffusion model for photorealistic results.

Medical RAG Chatbot
A retrieval-based assistant for querying medical documents. It uses LangChain and FAISS for accurate information retrieval and runs on AWS with a secure CI/CD setup through Jenkins and Trivy. The focus was on reliability, clean deployment pipelines, and consistent performance under load..
Python
Flask
LangChain
FAISS
Jenkins
Docker
Trivy
AWS
AI Study Companion
An AI-powered study assistant built with a complete GitOps workflow. It uses ArgoCD and Jenkins for automated deployments and Minikube for local Kubernetes orchestration. Designed to keep updates versioned, consistent, and easy to roll out.
Jenkins
ArgoCD
Kubernetes
Minikube
Docker
Tattoo RAG
I built a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that retrieves tattoo designs and info associated with them and generates new design inspirations based on users prompt.

Upscaler
I developed a web application for upscaling images using AI models ESRGAN and DWSR on the backend.

Structure from Motion
I built a fundamental 3D reconstruction pipeline from scratch, converting image sequences into camera poses and 3D point clouds.

Experience

Software Developer

2REN Sp. z o.o.

I led all IT operations as the sole technical specialist in a non-technical company, driving digital transformation. I developed a full-stack inventory management system with AI-driven structured data entry, achieving over 92% accuracy in automated item parsing. Reduced communication overhead and manual data entry, streamlining remote stock tracking for multilingual clients.
